question:
Consider the following statements about the term “HIMANSH”:
  1. It is a high altitude research station located at a remote location in Himachal Pradesh
  2. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Earth Sciences
  3. It aims to discover the reasons for fast melting of glaciers and its relation to changing climate
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. HIMANSH is a high altitude research station in Himalaya. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The research station has been established under the Ministry of Earth Sciences. <u>Third statement is also correct</u>. The research station aims to track the melting of Himalayan glaciers and changes in climate due to this. The researchers would also be using this as a base for undertaking surveys using Terrestrial Laser Scanners (TLS) and Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAV) that would digitize the glacier motion and snow cover variations with exceptional precision.
